duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and be accountable for the total operation of a store, ensuring maximum sales and profitability.
Establish and maintain Guest Services, and control expenses to optimize profitability.
Responsible for shrink, merchandising, and inventory control to ensure efficient store operations.
Manage staffing, setup, pack-up and teardown of a seasonal store.
Ensure compliance with minimum age requirement (21) and flexible schedule for employees.
Meet physical demands of the job, such as standing/walking, climbing ladders, setting up fixtures, and lifting/moving up to 50 pounds.
